about_the_game:
PREVIOUS PLAYERS: I am creating environments for the game. EVERYTHING will be scaled! I am going to work on trying to reposition and scale everything down that has been previously saved for you into a manageable way so you don't lose previous saves. If you have a previous save and are worried of the changes, and would like me to manually adjust it for you, please contact me and Ill make it happen. All new saves will be good to go!

This game is a fun dominoes simulator! Do you remember how fun it was to knock them over?! No real dominoes required :P

You can place your dominoes on the board, watch them fall and do it over and over! There are save and load options for those who want to keep their creations and show them off or edit them later to add more!

Domino deletion real-time!

There are 8 save slots available that can also be overwritten if you want to improve a current design!

Feel free to report any errors and fixes needed. Don't forget to review!

Enjoy!

NOTE: Once I get some reviews/feedback, I will be able to further progress on the game :) Hoping all is well

MAJOR BENEFITS:

1. Requires much less computation than other simulators of similar genre!

2. Continuously updated!

3. Less expensive to have fun!

4. Let me know what else is great about this simulator compared to others!

Check out the game devlog on the menu page of the game!
detailed_description:
PREVIOUS PLAYERS: I am creating environments for the game. EVERYTHING will be scaled! I am going to work on trying to reposition and scale everything down that has been previously saved for you into a manageable way so you don't lose previous saves. If you have a previous save and are worried of the changes, and would like me to manually adjust it for you, please contact me and Ill make it happen. All new saves will be good to go!

This game is a fun dominoes simulator! Do you remember how fun it was to knock them over?! No real dominoes required :P

You can place your dominoes on the board, watch them fall and do it over and over! There are save and load options for those who want to keep their creations and show them off or edit them later to add more!

Domino deletion real-time!

There are 8 save slots available that can also be overwritten if you want to improve a current design!

Feel free to report any errors and fixes needed. Don't forget to review!

Enjoy!

NOTE: Once I get some reviews/feedback, I will be able to further progress on the game :) Hoping all is well

MAJOR BENEFITS:

1. Requires much less computation than other simulators of similar genre!

2. Continuously updated!

3. Less expensive to have fun!

4. Let me know what else is great about this simulator compared to others!

Check out the game devlog on the menu page of the game!
name: Dominoes3D Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64Bit 21H2
  • Processor: Intel(R) 2.5GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 2 GB of RAM minimum, OpenGL 2.1 and GLSL 1.2 support
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1536 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64Bit 21H2
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-10300H
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GFORCE GTX 1660Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX and/or OpenGL latest may be required

short_description: 3D simulator for dominoes fun! Place the dominoes on the board and hit play to watch them fall. Reset, save, or load games up to 8 slots available to show friends and family your domino designs and simulation!
